mapper.select: select m.m_Id as m_Id, p.product_No as product_No, b.basket_Quantity as basket_Quantity, p.pro_price as pro_price, p.pro_name as pro_name, b.basket_color as pro_color, b.basket_size as pro_size from basket b, product p, member m where b.product_no = p.product_no and b.m_id = m.m_id and m.m_id = #{m_Id}
select nvl(sum(pro_price*basket_quantity),0) money from basket b, product p where b.product_no = p.product_no and b.m_id = #{m_Id}
